name: Tron Game
description:
For learning Unity,  my school asked me to create a game about the universe of tron. The rule are simple :

- Kill your opponent with your trail

- Survive the longest

The score is calculated like this : 

Each kill give you point.

When you die you earn point based on the time you survived. 

The player who have the most point at the end of the timer win.

 Controls for 2 Players:

First Player /  Second Player

ZUPSDOWNQLEFTDRIGHT
